article_title: Ted Cruz goes on the offensive in Dane
article_text:
Ted Cruz goes on the offensive in Dane

The Texas senator took a swipe at Donald Trump for his recent demeaning tweets about Cruz’s wife and also touted his plans to repeal the health plan known as Obamacare, lessen federal regulations and institute a flat income tax.
